name: Dog and Pony Amsterdam
description:
Dog and Pony Amsterdam believes the foundations of design are rooted in strong ideas. We stand for craftsmanship, contemporary and distinctive design. We create media-defined solutions that have won awards at national and international level.
We work for brands such as NPO, 3FM, FunX, Cordaid, Volkswagen, Vodafone, Lebowski Publishers, Stop Aids Now, Top Notch and many more.
